GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
kasan: fix zeroing vmalloc memory with HW_TAGS

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 02b8b1b5a98bbc77b8b0e902090fe7b43b974784, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 23689e91fb22c15b84ac6c22ad9942039792f3af. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: kasan: fix zeroing vmalloc memory with HW_TAGS
